ONE HOUSE. ONE DREAM.
The Los Angeles Rams, LLC




USPTO Trademarks



›


The Los Angeles Rams, LLC



›


One House. One Dream. Application #88179876






Application Filed: 2018-11-02

Trademark Application Details





Mark For: ONE HOUSE. ONE DREAM.® trademark registration is intended to cover the categories of education and entertainment services in the nature of professional football games and exhibitions; providing sports and entertainment information via a global computer network or a commercial on-line computer service or by cable, satellite, television and radio; organizing football sporting and cultural events; fan club services; entertainment services, namely, fan clubs engaged in cheering, chanting, singing and other motivational activities for entertainment, amusement and recreation at professional football games, sports exhibitions, and other special events. [all]
  Status
2021-05-19 UTC

⟳ Refresh

The trademark application has been registered with the Office.
